topic.title: Test Case 5: Conref to Keyref to a Text-Only Key

section.title: Case 5.1: Unscoped keyref
section.p: This is a keyref to text-only key "test-only-key-01" in the default scope. It has the ID "keyref-01":
This is a conref to the phrase "keyref-01" using "#test-case-05/keyref-01":
This is a conref to the phrase "keyref-01" using "#./keyref-01":

section.title: Case 5.2: Scoped keyref
section.p: This is a keyref to text-only key "test-only-key-02" in scope "scope-01". It has the ID "keyref-02":
